Board Games & Video Games.name: Pop Culture Pixel Pursuit
Board Games & Video Games.description: Test your knowledge of gaming and movie trivia! This quiz dives into the quirky corners of board games and video games, blending iconic characters with classic gameplay.

questions.text: In the movie 'Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me' what is the name of Dr. Evil's diminutive clone?
questions.hint: The name is a playful reference to his small size and resemblance to Dr. Evil.

questions.text: What new token was recently added to the Monopoly board game?
questions.hint: This token reflects wealth, fitting the game’s financial theme.

questions.text: What is the name of Mario's brother in the 'Super Mario' video games?
questions.hint: His name is similar to Mario’s but starts with an 'L' and wears green.
